Name: Watermelon Cooler
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Review: Summery, refreshing and light. Looks like watermelon and tastes reminiscent of watermelon but contains no watermelon.
Nutrition: One serving of Watermelon Cooler contains 179 calories
